mapper.select: SELECT MPIM.COMPANY_CD , MPIM.DIVISION_CD , MPID.INOUT_NO , MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , MPID.REFERENCE_NO AS PO_NO , MPID.REFERENCE_DTL_NO AS PO_DETAIL_NO , TO_CHAR(MPID.RECEIPT_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RECEIPT_DATE , MPID.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MPID.RECEIPT_QTY , MPID.INOUT_UOM AS RECEIPT_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MPID.INOUT_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS RECEIPT_UOM_NM , MPID.CONVERSION_QTY , MPID.CONVERSION_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, MPID.CONVERSION_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UOM_NM , MPID.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPID.COMPANY_CD, MPID.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPID.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MPID.EXCHANGE_RATE , MPID.UNIT_PRICE , MPID.AMOUNT , MPID.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MPIM.TAX_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0029', MPIM.TAX_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS TAX_TYPE_NM , TRUNC(ROUND(MPID.LOCAL_AMOUNT * (MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_TAX_RATE(MPIM.COMPANY_CD , MPIM.DIVISION_CD , MPIM.TAX_TYPE)) ,0),-1) AS TAX_AMOUNT FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPID , MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_MST MPIM , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_TAX_INVOICE_DTL MTID WHERE MPID.COMPANY_CD = MPIM.COMPANY_CD AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MPIM.DIVISION_CD AND MPID.INOUT_NO = MPIM.INOUT_NO AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPID.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = MTID.COMPANY_CD(+) AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = MTID.DIVISION_CD(+) AND MPID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID = MTID.REFERENCE_DTL_NO(+) AND MPID.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.VENDOR_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (MPID.RECEIPT_DATE < #{invoiceDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR MPID.RECEIPT_DATE = #{invoiceDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND MPIM.TAX_TYPE = #{taxType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPID.CLOSING_YN = 'N' AND MTID.REFERENCE_DTL_NO IS NULL
